means: 读唇法（聋子以观察人发生时的口型学语的方法）

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... Lipps figure 利普斯图形 lipreading 读唇法 lips 唇.
失聪不久，就学会唇读（lipreading），这是造物主赐的本能。虽然读得不好，仍有不少帮助。
lippy 利比, lipreading 口语看话, lippy 无礼的

list.abs: LAMP 平台 Linux， Apache， MySql， and PHP读唇系统 lipreading system唇同步；语音同步 lip-sync
effectivity from single visual channel lipreading system ., 视觉单通道唇读系统的有效性.
effectivity from single visual channel lipreading system ., 视觉单通道唇读系统的有效性.

entry.def: If someone can lip-read, they are able to understand what someone else is saying by looking at the way the other person's lips move as they speak, without actually hearing any of the words.

example.ex: They are not given hearing aids or taught to lip-read.
example.tran: 没有给他们提供助听设备，也没教过他们唇读。

means.word_mean: 1. perceiving what a person is saying by observing the movements of the lips

auth_sentence.content: Not hovering outside the lab so much, peering through the windows and lipreading.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not hovering outside the lab so much, peering through the windows and lipreading.
